verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and <S%G5095>Timotheus,<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi,<s%> with the <S%G1985>bishops<s%> and <S%G1249>deacons:<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and from the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
I <S%G2168>thank<s%> my <S%G2316>God<s%> on <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3417>remembrance<s%> of you,
<S%G3842>Always<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1162>prayer<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> for you <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1162>request<s%> with <S%G5479>joy,<s%>
For <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> in the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> from the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3568>now;<s%>

Being <S%G3982>confident<s%> of <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> thing, that he which has <S%G1728>begun<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> in you will <S%G2005>perform<s%> it <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

<S%G2531>Even<s%> as it is <S%G1342>meet<s%> for me to <S%G5426>think<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> of you <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> you in my <S%G2588>heart;<s%> <S%G1909>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745><s%> as <S%G5037>both<s%> in my <S%G1199>bonds,<s%> and in the <S%G627>defense<s%> and <S%G951>confirmation<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> you <S%G3956>all<s%> are <S%G4791>partakers<s%> of my <S%G5485>grace.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> is my <S%G3144>record,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> <S%G1971>greatly<s%> I <S%G1971>long<s%> <S%G1971>after<s%> you <S%G3956>all<s%> in the <S%G4698>bowels<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G4336>pray,<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> may <S%G4052>abound<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> and <S%G3123>more<s%> in <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G144>judgment;<s%>

That you may <S%G1381>approve<s%> things that are <S%G1308>excellent;<s%> that you may be <S%G1506>sincere<s%> and <S%G677>without<s%> <S%G677>offense<s%> <S%G1519>till<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

Being <S%G4137>filled<s%> with the <S%G2590>fruits<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G1868>praise<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But I would you should <S%G1097>understand,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that the things which happened to me have <S%G2064>fallen<s%> out <S%G3123>rather<s%> to the <S%G4297>furtherance<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel;<s%>
<S%G5620>So<s%> that my <S%G1199>bonds<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> are <S%G5318>manifest<s%> in <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4232>palace,<s%> and in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> places;

And <S%G4119>many<s%> of the <S%G80>brothers<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3982>waxing<s%> <S%G3982>confident<s%> by my <S%G1199>bonds,<s%> are <S%G4056>much<s%> <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G5111>bold<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G870>without<s%> <S%G870>fear.<s%>

<S%G5100>Some<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> of <S%G5355>envy<s%> and <S%G2054>strife;<s%> and <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2107>good<s%> <S%G2107>will:<s%>

The <S%G3303>one<s%> <S%G2605>preach<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of <S%G2052>contention,<s%> not <S%G55>sincerely,<s%> <S%G3633>supposing<s%> to <S%G2018>add<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> to my <S%G1199>bonds:<s%>
But the other of <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that I am <S%G2749>set<s%> for the <S%G627>defense<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1063>then?<s%> <S%G4133>notwithstanding,<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5158>way,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> in <S%G4392>pretense,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> in <S%G226>truth,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2605>preached;<s%> and I <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G5129><s%> do <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> and will <S%G5463>rejoice.<s%>

For I <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G5124>this<s%> shall <S%G576>turn<s%> to my <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1162>prayer,<s%> and the <S%G2024>supply<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G2596>According<s%> to my <S%G603>earnest<s%> <S%G603>expectation<s%> and my <S%G1680>hope,<s%> that in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> I shall be <S%G153>ashamed,<s%> but that with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3954>boldness,<s%> as <S%G3842>always,<s%> so <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall be <S%G3170>magnified<s%> in my <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> it be by <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> by <S%G2288>death.<s%>
For to me to <S%G2198>live<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and to <S%G599>die<s%> is <S%G2771>gain.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G2198>live<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> is the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of my <S%G2041>labor:<s%> <S%G2532>yet<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> I shall <S%G138>choose<s%> I <S%G1107>know<s%> not.

For I am in a <S%G4912>strait<s%> <S%G1537>between<s%> <S%G1417>two,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1939>desire<s%> to <S%G360>depart,<s%> and to be with <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> which is <S%G4183>far<s%> <S%G3123><s%> <S%G2909>better:<s%>
<S%G1161>Nevertheless<s%> to <S%G1961>abide<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G316>more<s%> <S%G316>needful<s%> for you.

And having <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3982>confidence,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> that I shall <S%G3306>abide<s%> and <S%G4839>continue<s%> with you <S%G3956>all<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4297>furtherance<s%> and <S%G5479>joy<s%> of <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
That <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2745>rejoicing<s%> may be more <S%G4052>abundant<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for me by my <S%G3952>coming<s%> to you <S%G3825>again.<s%>

<S%G3440>Only<s%> let your <S%G4176>conversation<s%> be as it <S%G516>becomes<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> that <S%G1535>whether<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G1492>see<s%> you, <S%G1535>or<s%> else be <S%G548>absent,<s%> I may <S%G191>hear<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4012>affairs,<s%> that you <S%G4739>stand<s%> fast in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> with <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G5590>mind<s%> <S%G4866>striving<s%> <S%G4866>together<s%> for the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel;<s%>

And in <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G4426>terrified<s%> by <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G480>adversaries:<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is to them an <S%G1732>evident<s%> <S%G1732>token<s%> of <S%G684>perdition,<s%> but to you of <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> and that of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For to you it is <S%G5483>given<s%> in the <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> not <S%G3440>only<s%> to <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him, but <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%> for his sake;
<S%G2192>Having<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G73>conflict<s%> <S%G3634>which<s%> you <S%G1492>saw<s%> in me, and <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> to be in me.
